mapper.select: select o.id orderId, o.order_no, o.status, o.create_at, seller.brand_name sellerName, seller.avator sellerAvatar, seller.customer_id sellerUserId, t.tier_name, t.thumbnail tierThumbnail, o.total, o.card_type, t.tier_description from oasis_membership_order o inner join oasis_membership_tier t on o.tier_id=t.id inner join brand seller on o.seller_brand_id=seller.id where 1 = 1 and o.id=#{id}
